title: How great thou art
raw:
Intro
[C]  
Verse 1  
O Lord my [C]God, When I in [F]awesome wonder, Consider 
[Am7]all the [G]worlds Thy Hands have [C]made
I see the [C]stars, I hear the 
[F]rolling thunder
Thy power through [Am7]out the 
[G]universe dis[C]played  
Chorus  
Then sings my [Am7] soul, My 
[F]Savior God, to [C]Thee
How great Thou [G]art,
[F]How great Thou [C]art
Then sings my [Am7]soul, My 
[F]Savior God, to [C]Thee  
How great Thou [G]art,
[F]How great Thou [C]art  
(Vamp on intro after each Chorus) 
Verse 2:  
And when I [C]think, that God, His 
[F]Son not sparing Sent Him to 
[Am7]die,I [G]scarce can take it [C]in
That on the [C]Cross, my burden g[F]ladly bearing He bled and 
[Am7]died to [G]take away my [C]sin  
Verse 3:
When Christ shall [C]come, with shout of [F]acclamation 
And take me [Am7]home, what 
[G]joy shall fill my [C]heart
Then I shall [C]bow, in humble [F]adoration
And then pro[Am7]claim My 
[G]God, how great Thou [F]art
